scripts.build:pdf:compact: md-to-pdf public/README.md --launch-options '{ "args": ["--no-sandbox"] }' --pdf-options '{ "format": "A4", "margin": { "top": "10mm", "right": "10mm", "bottom": "10mm", "left": "10mm" }, "scale": 0.8 }' --css 'body { font-family: "Noto Sans CJK JP", sans-serif; font-size: 11px; line-height: 1.3; } body :lang(en) { font-size: 10px; } h2 { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 5px; } h3 { margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 4px; } p, ul, ol { margin-top: 4px; margin-bottom: 4px; } code { font-size: 10px; } code:lang(en) { font-size: 10px; } table { font-size: 10px; } pre { font-size: 10px; padding: 5px; margin: 5px 0; }'
